00001 #include<Myro.h>
00002 #include<iostream>
00003 
00004 int main(){
00005     connect();
00006     GraphWin win("Cascading Windows", 400, 300);
00007     for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++){
00008         Point anchor(10+i*30, 10+i*20);
00009         Image img(anchor, robot.takePicture());
00010         img.draw(win);
00011     }
00012     disconnect();
00013 }
